definition: to transfer to full membership/to obtain tenure
to revolve/to turn/to circle about/to walk about/classifier for revolutions (per minute etc): revs, rpm/classifier for repeated actions
to turn/to change direction/to transfer/to forward (mail)
first month of the lunar year
straight/upright/proper/main/principal/to correct/to rectify/exactly/just (at that time)/right (in that place)/(math.) positive

sentences.english: In any case, by the autumn of 2006 the line between unofficial concept and formal project had been crossed.
sentences.chinese: 2006年秋天，这个非正式项目转正了。

sentences.english: After 1994, the work finally ran onto normal route.
sentences.chinese: 1994年以后，民办教师转正规模化。

sentences.english: The  official announcement took a little while to come out, but it's now official. As the announcement states
sentences.chinese: 官方公告花了一些时间才出炉，但现在它终于转正了。

sentences.english: It is the first monthly growth since January.
sentences.chinese: 自今年1月以来，这是CPI首次由负转正。

definition: to receive a raise in salary
to promote to a higher position
to keep an official position/to hold on to one's job
to be transferred to another post/to post away
